state: Welcome to TextWorld! First of all, you could, like, make an effort to move north. And then, make an attempt to move west. After that, try to head west. And then, travel north. With that done, head west. With that over with, try to head west. And then, attempt to go south. And then, make an effort to go to the east. If you can succeed at that, go south. Following that, make an effort to take a trip west. After that, try to move south. If you can get around to doing that, head west. After that, make an effort to move south. Okay, and then, attempt to move west. Then, pick-up the coin from the floor of the scullery. And once you've done that, you win! -= Garage =- You arrive in a garage. An usual kind of place. You try to gain information on your surroundings by using a technique you call "looking." You need an unblocked exit? You should try going north. > -= Garage =-0/1
-= Canteen =- Well, here we are in a canteen. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Canteen =-0/2

-= Attic =- You've entered an attic. You begin to take stock of what's here. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Attic =-0/3

-= Salon =- You arrive in a salon. An usual kind of place. The room is well lit. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Salon =-0/4
-= Cubicle =- You've just shown up in a cubicle. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going south. There is an unblocked exit to the west. > -= Cubicle =-0/5

-= Cookery =- You are in a cookery. A standard one. You decide to just list off a complete list of everything you see in the room, because hey, why not? You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Cookery =-0/6

-= Study =- Guess what, you are in a place we're calling a study. You decide to start listing off everything you see in the room, as if you were in a text adventure. There is an exit to the east. Don't worry, it is unblocked. You don't like doors? Why not try going south, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Study =-0/7
-= Launderette =- You've just sauntered into a launderette. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the north. > -= Launderette =-0/8

-= Bedchamber =- This is going to sound unbelievable, but you've just entered a bedchamber. You need an unblocked exit? You should try going south. You don't like doors? Why not try going west, that entranceway is unguarded. > -= Bedchamber =-0/9
-= Kitchen =- You've entered a kitchen. You don't like doors? Why not try going north, that entranceway is unblocked. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unguarded. > -= Kitchen =-0/10

-= Cookhouse =- You arrive in a cookhouse. A standard kind of place. I guess you better just go and list everything you see here. You don't like doors? Why not try going east, that entranceway is unguarded. There is an unblocked exit to the south. > -= Cookhouse =-0/11

-= Kitchenette =- You've just sauntered into a kitchenette. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going north. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going west. > -= Kitchenette =-0/12
-= Spare Room =- Fancy seeing you here. Here, by the way, being the spare room. You need an unguarded exit? You should try going east. There is an unguarded exit to the south. > -= Spare Room =-0/13

-= Studio =- You are in a studio. An ordinary kind of place. Okay, just remember what you're here to do, and everything will go great. There is an exit to the north. Don't worry, it is unguarded. There is an exit to the west. Don't worry, it is unblocked. > -= Studio =-0/14
-= Scullery =- Well how about that, you are in a place we're calling a scullery. There is an unblocked exit to the east. There is a coin on the floor. > -= Scullery =-0/15
